heartstopper.s2.e1.name: S02 E01 · Out
heartstopper.s2.e1.desc: As his relationship with Charlie matures, Nick considers coming out to Imogen — but it's a lot harder than he expected. Elle tries flirting with Tao.

heartstopper.s2.e2.name: S02 E02 · Family
heartstopper.s2.e2.desc: With Charlie's grades slipping, his parents tighten the rules. Tao's jealous when Elle makes new friends. Nick's older brother invades his privacy.

heartstopper.s2.e3.name: S02 E03 · Promise
heartstopper.s2.e3.desc: Nick tries to come out to some of his teammates at a bonfire party after exams. Tao plans the perfect date. Things get weird between Tara and Darcy.

heartstopper.s2.e4.name: S02 E04 · Challenge
heartstopper.s2.e4.desc: On a school trip to Paris, Nick and Charlie try to keep their relationship under wraps. Elle and Tao reconnect at a museum. Imogen stands up to Ben.

heartstopper.s2.e5.name: S02 E05 · Heat
heartstopper.s2.e5.desc: Rumors spread when Charlie wakes up with something on his neck. A group tour of the city's most famous sights reveals more than one major secret.

heartstopper.s2.e6.name: S02 E06 · Truth / Dare
heartstopper.s2.e6.desc: On their last day in Paris, Nick introduces Charlie to his dad. Elle and Tao make it official. The truth comes out at a party that's full of surprises.

heartstopper.s2.e7.name: S02 E07 · Sorry
heartstopper.s2.e7.desc: Elle keeps big news from Tao, Ben pressures Charlie to forgive him, and Isaac opens up to James. Nick invites Charlie to a tense family dinner.

heartstopper.s2.e8.name: S02 E08 · Perfect
heartstopper.s2.e8.desc: The gang comes together for a memorable prom with a fitting theme: Summer of Love. But with someone important missing... it feels incomplete.
